Scholz, Zelenskiy discuss military support, peace in phone callGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz assured Ukraine its international partners will cooperate closely on military support in a telephone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy, a government spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 21:17:48 GMT 27BTF3ZTFNK2BAUB55ODJPLTGI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/scholz-zelenskiy-discuss-military-support-peace-phone-call-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
US locks in UN resolution backing efforts to broker Gaza truceThe U.S. on Thursday finalized its draft U.N. Security Council resolution on the Israel-Hamas war, traditionally the final step before asking for a vote on the text that would back international efforts to broker an immediate ceasefire as part of a hostage release deal. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 21:17:08 GMT T3E5CGDCQVI7HPS7YTPCP5IEQY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-locks-un-resolution-backing-efforts-broker-gaza-truce-2024-03-14/Reuters世界
Britain's Prince William pays tribute to his late mother Princess Diana at awards eventBritain's Prince William said on Thursday his late mother Princess Diana would have been honoured to see a charity set up in her name doing "inspirational work" to support young people around the world. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 20:45:08 GMT U7HA4AE5E5OTHJ4GDAZWTQ2YMU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-prince-william-pays-tribute-his-late-mother-princess-diana-awards-event-2024-03-14/Reuters世界英国
Thousands in Israel protest for hostages release, conscription of ultra-OrthodoxThousands in Israel took to the streets on Thursday in two separate protests, one demanding an immediate release of hostages from Gaza and another calling for drafting ultra-Orthodox Jewish men into the military. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 20:34:47 GMT TNX5Z5L7E5PA5J7P6YKIWN3I6I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/thousands-israel-protest-hostages-release-conscription-ultra-orthodox-2024-03-14/Janis Laizans, Rami Amichay世界中东
EU's Borrell says US must put more pressure on Israel over Gaza aidEuropean Union foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Thursday after meetings in Washington that the United States should put more pressure on Israel to allow more aid into Gaza, amid what he called a man-made disaster in the strip. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 20:31:43 GMT T6ZDENFDBZJ7FJLL6DDTSBNVYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-borrell-says-us-must-put-more-Pressure-israel-over-gaza-aid-2024-03-14/Simon Lewis世界欧洲
Venezuela opposition candidate pressured by allies to choose a substitute, sources sayVenezuela opposition leader Maria Corina Machado is facing increasing pressure from her allies to choose a substitute to potentially run in her place in the July presidential election, five sources with knowledge of the matter said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 20:21:27 GMT QF7V3AXM5JKBHN36ZGFD75DK2A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-opposition-candidate-pressed-by-allies-choose-substitute-sources-say-2024-03-14/Vivian Sequera, Mayela Armas世界美洲
France's Macron says Europe must be ready for war if it wants peaceFrench President Emmanuel Macron said on Thursday Europe should prepare for war if it wants peace, calling President Vladimir Putin's Russia an adversary that would not stop in Ukraine if it defeated Kyiv's troops in the two-year-old conflict. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 20:06:04 GMT I7FG3WAYTBOM7AU2O3JJM4ZQLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/frances-macron-says-europe-must-be-ready-war-if-it-wants-peace-2024-03-14/Michel Rose世界欧洲
US says to open Vanuatu embassy 'imminently', warns of China dealsThe United States will open an embassy in Vanuatu "imminently" and is working to get the approval of the parliament in Kiribati for a mission, the top U.S. diplomat for East Asia said on Thursday, while reiterating warnings to Pacific Island countries of the dangers of agreements with China. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 19:34:54 GMT LEGXFKW5PVKSLNGA7OY5W5GUI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-says-open-vanuatu-embassy-imminently-warns-china-deals-2024-03-14/David Brunnstrom世界亚太地区
French lawmakers approve bill to apply penalties on fast fashionFrance's lower house of parliament on Thursday approved a bill seeking penalties on ultra-fast fashion products, sold by companies like China's Shein, aimed at helping to offset their environmental impact. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 19:10:49 GMT 3Z4XEYGEK5MZ3NBANFDX7AQ22M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-lawmakers-approve-bill-apply-penalties-fast-fashion-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
UK PM Rishi Sunak rules out holding an election in early MayBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said on Thursday that he would not hold a general election in early May, in the strongest indication yet that the national vote would take place later this year. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 18:48:26 GMT JJ7LO52M3JJA3LLH4ZQUH2V2IA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-pm-rishi-sunak-rules-out-holding-an-election-early-may-2024-03-14/Andrew Macaskill, Farouq Suleiman世界英国
EU's Borrell, in Washington, says outcome of Ukraine war will be decided this spring and summerThe EU's foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Thursday after holding meetings in Washington that securing new support for Ukraine could not wait since the outcome of the war in Ukraine will be decided this spring and summer. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 18:30:17 GMT STZWHVIQL5IW3LZPWODKT4R7DA https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-foreign-policy-chief-borrell-washington-says-outcome-ukraine-war-will-be-2024-03-14/Simon Lewis世界
